Kahvenizinboyutunuseçiniz: Choose the size of your coffee
text1: This note was written to you by a coffee lover.  I have learned some things in my research to improve the app and I would like to share them with you.
text2: The average value that an adult should consume is 400 milligrams of caffeine. This means an average of 4 cups of coffee. Of course, this situation varies according to weight, disease and body tolerance.
text3: You may already know that not all coffee contains the same amount of caffeine. This can vary depending on the size and type of coffee bean, the brewing time and the amount of milk used.
text4: The values calculated here will give you an average value. If your caffeine intake is consistently high, trust the app and reduce your intake.
Birsayıiçermeli: Must contain a number of letters
